definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 wei4 zhi4 ce4 ding4 xi4 tong3
fang4 she4 mian3 yi4 ce4 ding4

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 測定了龍竹竹材在不同熱壓溫度下乾燥時的溫度分佈。

sentences.english: The fluorosilicon polymers with different vinyl contents were vulcanized by using of benzyl peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用碘量法測定的乙烯基含量與理論值相符。

sentences.english: The findings are based on detailed radar measurements of ice caps on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 這些發現是基於對火星冰冠的詳細雷達測定數據。

sentences.english: Compensation method was used to eliminate disturbance of coexisting element titanium.
sentences.chinese: 以補償法消除共存元素鈦對鈣的測定干擾。

sentences.english: China Adult Constitute Standard Guide has certain applicative value.
sentences.chinese: 《中國成年人體質測定標準指南》具有應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the determination of in Folium Cajani by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立木豆葉中牡荊苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Some physiological indices of Rana plancyi plancyi were tested before and after hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 實驗測定了金線蛙冬眠前後幾項生理指標。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the study on haemogram and blood biochemical parameters of 12 healthy Sichuan golden monkeys (Rhinopithecus roxellanae).
sentences.chinese: 測定了12只川金絲猴的血象和血液生物化學指標。

sentences.english: The content of etoposide injection was determined by first order derivative spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 用一階導數光譜法測定足葉乙甙注射液的含量。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To study the compositions and contents of Amino Acids in the Fruit of Eucalyptus globulus Labill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究藍桉果實中氨基酸的種類並測定其含量。

sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金剛藤軟膠囊中薯蕷皁苷元的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: This method was successfully applied to the determination of gallic acid in Jianming Yanhou tablets.
sentences.chinese: 方法成功地用於健民咽喉片中沒食子酸的測定。

sentences.english: The immunity serum titer was mensurated by the routine ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 常規ELISA法測定免疫血清效價。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the determination of alcohol residue in enoxacin gluconate by GC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立葡萄糖酸依諾沙星中乙醇殘留量的測定方法。

sentences.english: The silicides in the cuticle of wheat straw stem were studied by means of XPS-peak-differenating analysis.
sentences.chinese: 進行麥稈皮層硅化物的XPS測定及分峯擬合分析。

sentences.english: Thus, the Se contents in oyster can be measured by Catalytic-kinetic photometry.
sentences.chinese: 應用催化動力學光度法可以測定牡蠣中硒的含量。

definition: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution)/consistency/thickness/density/viscosity
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
